feed.title: A critique of bitcoin open source community

entry.title: A critique of bitcoin open source community
entry.summary: In an email thread from 2013, Jean-Paul Kogelman apologizes for a mistake he made in his previous message. He clarifies that he submitted a proposal to the mailing list on July 19, 2003, not 2013 as previously stated. The email also includes a signature.asc attachment, which is a digital signature created with OpenPGP using GPGMail.
